title: Hearty Roasted Squash
description: It is meaty, has great flavor, easy to prepare and makes an easy meal in and of itself.
author: Simply Gourmet

steps.name: Prep the Squash
instructions: cube sweet potato, cut squash lengthwise and scoop seeds out
lay sweet potatos on a baking tray with squash, center hole up

steps.name: The Cream Base
instructions: pour heavy cream in a measuring cup
finely chop thyme leaves and garlic
add thyme, garlic, and salt to cream

steps.name: Bringing it all together!
instructions: Pour cream mix into the center of the squash
